title: An accidental A
content:
My son was having a cup of cocoa, when he called me to see this. He knows how to get my attention.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120730040345im_/http:/typophile.com/files/a-muki_3432.png)
author: mili

comments.content: hahahahaha! Sometimes I find shapes in water splashes on the tile of my shower. We are sad people. :-) Mikey
